sig_info: Maximum Durability for the Ablative Shield is increased by +1 for every 24 signature levels obtained. Max increase of +4.
Well-Timed blocks have a 10 to 80% chance to prevent Durability loss.
Trauma, Slow and Fragility Debuffs last 5 to 9.99% longer.

ABLATIVE SHIELD: Red Guardian can’t gain Buffs, whenever a Buff attempts to trigger he gains +1 Durability for his Ablative Shield instead. Cooldown: 0.80 seconds.
The Ablative Shield starts each fight at 9 Durability and can stack up to a max of 10. Each blocked hit removes 1 Durability.
Each Stack of Durability increases Perfect Block chance by 5%. Perfect Blocks reduce incoming damage to 0.
While the Shield is intact, Red Guardian can block Heavy and Unblockable Attacks and gains 1066.67 Block Proficiency.
Blocking a Heavy or Unblockable Attack reduces Shield Durability to 0, however all hits of the incoming Attack can be blocked.

When reaching 0 Durability the Shield is Fractured, entering cooldown for 8 seconds. This cooldown increases by 300% each time Fracture occurs. When cooldown ends, the Shield is repaired at 7 Durability.
ON FRACTURE: Carbonadium shards from the Ablative Shield burst onto the Opponent, inflicting a Stun Debuff for 1.90 seconds.
Inflict a Trauma Debuff for 3 seconds, Trauma causes each hit to deal an additional 70% of the damage recently dealt as burst Physical Damage. Max Stacks 3.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Gain +14.4 Attack Rating for each unique Debuff on the Opponent.
Refresh all Slow, Fragility and Trauma Debuffs on the Opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation inflict a non-stacking Slow Debuff for 12 seconds.
While the Opponent is suffering from Slow, Red Guardian’s Combat Power Rate is increased by 25%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On activation if the Ablative Shield was intact, gain +30.72 Attack Rating throughout this Special.
If this Attack strikes the Opponent the Ablative Shield is Fractured, removing all Durability. Each stack of Durability removed grants an additional +11.52 Attack Rating to each hit of this attack.
During this attack any Debuffs inflicted last 100% longer.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: If the Ablative Shield is active, it's Durability is set to max. If the Ablative Shield is Fractured its cooldown ends immediately.
100% chance to inflict a Stun Debuff for 1.90 seconds.
100% chance to inflict a 20 second Fragility Debuff. Attacking a Fragile Opponent grants +900 Critical Damage Rating and reduces Block Proficiency by 50%.

While the Opponent is suffering from Slow, Red Guardian’s Combat Power Rate is increased by 25%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On activation if the Ablative Shield was intact, gain +255.68 Attack Rating throughout this Special.
If this Attack strikes the Opponent the Ablative Shield is Fractured, removing all Durability. Each stack of Durability removed grants an additional +95.88 Attack Rating to each hit of this attack.
During this attack any Debuffs inflicted last 100% longer.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: If the Ablative Shield is active, it's Durability is set to max. If the Ablative Shield is Fractured its cooldown ends immediately.
100% chance to inflict a Stun Debuff for 1.90 seconds.
100% chance to inflict a 20 second Fragility Debuff. Attacking a Fragile Opponent grants +1068.75 Critical Damage Rating and reduces Block Proficiency by 50%.

sig_info: Maximum Durability for the Ablative Shield is increased by +1 for every 40 signature levels obtained. Max increase of +5.
Well-Timed blocks have a 10 to 100% chance to prevent Durability loss.
Trauma, Slow and Fragility Debuffs last 5.01 to 30% longer.

ABLATIVE SHIELD: Red Guardian can’t gain Buffs, whenever a Buff attempts to trigger he gains +1 Durability for his Ablative Shield instead. Cooldown: 0.80 seconds.
The Ablative Shield starts each fight at 9 Durability and can stack up to a max of 10. Each blocked hit removes 1 Durability.
Each Stack of Durability increases Perfect Block chance by 5%. Perfect Blocks reduce incoming damage to 0.
While the Shield is intact, Red Guardian can block Heavy and Unblockable Attacks and gains 1300 Block Proficiency.
Blocking a Heavy or Unblockable Attack reduces Shield Durability to 0, however all hits of the incoming Attack can be blocked.

When reaching 0 Durability the Shield is Fractured, entering cooldown for 8 seconds. This cooldown increases by 300% each time Fracture occurs. When cooldown ends, the Shield is repaired at 7 Durability.
ON FRACTURE: Carbonadium shards from the Ablative Shield burst onto the Opponent, inflicting a Stun Debuff for 1.90 seconds.
Inflict a Trauma Debuff for 3 seconds, Trauma causes each hit to deal an additional 70% of the damage recently dealt as burst Physical Damage. Max Stacks 3.
